greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers k such that k divides Sum_{j=1..k} prime(j)^13.
link: OEIS Wiki, Sums of powers of primes divisibility sequences.
mathematica: s = 0; Do[s = s + Prime[n]^13; If[ Mod[s, n] == 0, Print[n]], {n, 200000}]
xref: Cf. A085450 = smallest m > 1 such that m divides Sum_{k=1..m} prime(k)^n.
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Jun 25 2007
ext: a(6)-a(8) from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 30 2007
